author: GamingBolt
description:
DOOM: The Dark Ages is finally upon us, and excitement surrounding the newest entry in id Software’s long running ripping-and-tearing shooter series is understandably high.

Gameplay tweaks and new ideas combine to lend a new style and flavor to the moment to moment gameplay, with the core combat experience still retaining the aggression and brutality that you would expect from a DOOM game. 

All of that, of course, means that there’s a lot going on at any given moment in DOOM: The Dark Ages, with players being challenged to juggle a lot at once in the heat of the hottest of firefights. 

Here, we’ve put together a few tips and tricks to help you get to grips with the game that much faster.
title: 15 Things I Wish I Knew Before Starting DOOM: The Dark Ages

author: GamingBolt
description:
Onimusha is an outsider amongst other big names. Still, that hasn’t stopped the series accumulating something of a cult following, with fans of the medieval Japanese adventure praising the series’ marquee hack and slash combat combined with environmental puzzling, exploration, and pacing of survival horror. 

Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny follows a remaster of the first game in the series – Onimusha: Warlords – and this sequel arguably betters its predecessor in every way. The time is nigh to step into the horror-tinted historical Japan again, blade in hand and demons to slay. 

This video highlights fifteen things to know before you hit that buy now button.
title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny Remaster - 15 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy
